name: Citizen Ticket
description:
Citizen Ticket - the first event ticketing platform on the blockchain. 

CT has launched a new ticket delivery system, BitTicket. The first digital event tickets on the blockchain for public events - utilizing the cryptocurrency Ethereum Classic to eradicate ticket touts. 

www.citizenticket.co.uk

Ethical, Secure & Independent

team.name: Philip Shaw-Stewart
team.bioHtml: Co-founded the ethical ticketing platform Citizen Ticket in 2013. In 2017 Citizen Ticket launched its blockchain technology BitTicket.

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.description:
WHAT WE DO
Citizen Ticket’s mission is to provide a ticketing platform for one million event organisers worldwide, and make a positive global impact in the process.

WHY WE DO IT
We believe ticketing can be turned into a force for good. From every ticket sold on Citizen Ticket, we contribute 5p to planting a tree to create a sustainable future for our planet.

WHO WE ARE
We are a group of event organisers and developers that formed Citizen Ticket in 2013 to respond to the numerous problems we saw within the event ticketing industry. Industry incumbents, ticket touts, counterfeiting, inflated booking fees and secondary ticket websites were extorting event organisers and attendees to generate unethical profits.
We believed that there could be a better way, and today we are proud to deliver an ethical service that reflects the positive nature and ethos of the events that we work.

THE TEAM
We have a team of highly talented and driven individuals, with a strong and growing team culture. The current team consists of 9 people in total (including founders) and intends on growing to 12 in the next 6 months. Our development team currently consists of 4, spread over the online platform, the app and the server infrastructure.

THE CHALLENGE
Citizen Ticket is rapidly expanding, increasing the pressure and expectations of the online platform to meet event organisers needs, and provide a streamlined e-commerce solution for ticket purchasers. 

Citizen Ticket requires a dedicated full stack web developer to maintain and optimise the online platform, and continuously innovate new solutions for a scaling business, to ensure sustainable growth. 
 
THE ROLE
We are looking for a primarily PHP developer to work across our web platform, but the successful candidate will have to have diverse full stack capabilities. The candidate will work alongside our lead developer and will be supported and mentored by our CTO. During the course of the role, the successful candidate will be expected to develop their skill set.
After probation, there will be creative opportunity given to work on projects outside of this scope decided by the candidate (“20%” time).

THE SKILL SET
- Full stack web development with a variety of languages including but not limited to PHP, JavaScript & HTML
- A strong understanding of MySQL databases
- Minimum 5+ years programming experience
- Experience with using Git (Gitlab experience a plus)
- Must be a self-starter, able to motivate and manage themselves effectively.
- Strong desire to build something and to work in an innovative, dynamic and fast paced company
- Polite, well¬ mannered, excellent written and verbal communication skills. - - Able to simplify, articulate and convey technical aspects to non-technical team members

BONUS POINTS
- An understanding and or interest in the application of Blockchain technologies.
- A Computer Science related degree
- Experience in React Native & Node JS
